title: Prepare to be swept away by this spectacular view! Tour today!
posting_body: ['Polo Club Apartments', 'Located at: 100 Ashley Creek Cir Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2 bath | 1094 sq ft', 'Prices start at: Please call', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to Polo Club, beautiful two and three bedroom apartment homes designed for your comfort and convenience.', 'Polo Club provides residents private decks for those quiet times.', 'Our interior amenities will assure you that Polo Club is the choice for your new home.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Community Events', '● On Marta bus-line', '● Pet Care', '● Picnic Area', '● Playground', '● Tennis Court', '● Cardio & Fitness Center', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Electronic Rent Payment', '● Minutes to Stone Mountain park', '● On-Site Management', '● Package Receiving', '● Resort Style Swimming Pool', '● Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment Nearby', 'Apartment Features!', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpet', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Extra Storage', '● Range', '● Tub/Shower', '● Vinyl Flooring', '● Air Conditioning and Gas Heating', '● Brushed Nickel Lighting Package', '● Cozy Fireplaces', '● Huge Floorplans up to 1300 sq.', 'ft.', '● Newly Updated Apartments', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Roommate Floor Plans', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer & Dryer Connections', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pets per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D225BF0D9D4E426']
